nodes.description: 伊拉克巴格达及多个城市发生系列袭击，针对警察检查站、市场、市长办公室和纺织厂
nodes.support_text: BAGHDAD — A series of attacks in Baghdad and other cities across Iraq on Monday struck police and army checkpoints, as well as markets, a mayor’s office and a textile factory.

nodes.description: 袭击始于巴格达凌晨5点解除宵禁后，武装分子伪装成市政清洁工突袭10个检查站
nodes.support_text: The attacks began as the nightly curfew lifted in Baghdad at 5 a.m.

nodes.description: 法卢贾、Samarra、Tamimya和Suwayra等地发生汽车炸弹袭击，其中市场爆炸致11人死亡
nodes.support_text: Bombings soon followed in Falluja, Samarra, Tarmiya and Suwayra, where a parked car exploded in a market, killing 11 and wounding 60.

nodes.description: 晚间的Mahmudiya和Basra遭遇连环爆炸，Basra死亡人数达20人
nodes.support_text: On Monday evening a bomb struck in Mahmudiya, and three more exploded in Basra...

nodes.description: Hilla纺织厂停车场发生两辆汽车炸弹同步爆炸，造成41人死亡、150人受伤
nodes.support_text: Two bombs hidden in parked cars exploded almost simultaneously in the parking lot of the Hilla Textile Factory...

nodes.description: 袭击导致当天死亡人数突破101人，创年内新高并超过上月清真寺爆炸案伤亡
nodes.support_text: The attacks, which killed at least 101 people and wounded hundreds more, occurred amid a protracted dispute over the results of the country’s election more than two months ago.

nodes.description: 极端组织伊斯兰国承认损失两名 AQI指挥官，但未对本次袭击负责
nodes.support_text: The Islamic State of Iraq... acknowledged the loss of the two leaders... and vowed to keep waging war...

nodes.description: 巴格达多个检查站发生交火，武装分子使用伪造制服和消音器突袭
nodes.support_text: Gunmen, dressed as municipal street cleaners, ambushed 10 police and army checkpoints across the city...

nodes.description: 北部边境检查站遭自杀式袭击，造成2名库尔德士兵死亡
nodes.support_text: A suicide car bomber also struck one of 15 checkpoints controlled by American, Iraqi and Kurdish forces...

nodes.description: Samara和Tamimya地区发生针对伊朗朝圣者和农民的爆炸事件
nodes.support_text: Improvised bombs near Samarra wounded Iranian pilgrims and farmers.

nodes.description: Tamimya市长办公室遭袭致3人死亡，市长本人受伤送医
nodes.support_text: The bombing in Tarmiya struck near the office of the town’s mayor, killing three and wounding 13.

nodes.description: 极端组织通过袭击凸显在安全措施加强背景下仍能实施全国性攻击
nodes.support_text: The attacks underscored the ability of Iraq’s various extremist groups to mount catastrophic attacks throughout the country despite increased security...

nodes.description: 伊拉克官员Adel Abdul Mahdi呼吁加速组建新政府以应对恐怖威胁
nodes.support_text: One of Iraq’s two vice presidents, Adel Abdul Mahdi, called for speeding the formation of a new government...

nodes.description: 前议员Bahaa al-Araji批评军队纪律涣散和将领政治化倾向
nodes.support_text: A member of the departing Parliament’s security committee, Bahaa al-Araji, pointedly blamed the security forces for unclear loyalties...

nodes.description: 选举结果争议持续超过两个月，巴格达地区仍进行选票 recount
nodes.support_text: The attacks occurred amid a protracted dispute over the results of the country’s election more than two months ago.

nodes.description: 亲Allawi派系指责Maliki派系拆除纺织厂安全屏障
nodes.support_text: In Hilla, another supporter of Mr. Allawi’s alliance, Hassan al-Fatlawi, blamed the local provincial council... for removing security barriers.

nodes.description: Suwayra市场袭击者被指有意破坏政治进程
nodes.support_text: A security officer described the attack as an effort to deepen the country’s political turmoil.

nodes.description: 袭击持续至宵禁解除后
nodes.support_text: 袭击持续发生

nodes.description: 枪手杀害9名士兵和官员
nodes.support_text: 枪手杀害9名士兵和官员

nodes.description: 枪手使多人受伤
nodes.support_text: 枪手使多人受伤

nodes.description: 爆炸导致60人受伤
nodes.support_text: 爆炸导致60人受伤

nodes.description: 最严重的袭击发生在Hilla
nodes.support_text: 最严重的袭击发生在Hilla

nodes.description: 伤亡人数因工人下班离开而增加
nodes.support_text: 伤亡人数因工人下班离开而增加

nodes.description: 周一被确认为当年最血腥的一天
nodes.support_text: 周一死亡人数突破101人，创年内新高并超过上月清真寺爆炸案伤亡

nodes.description: 周一死亡人数超过上月炸弹袭击死亡人数

nodes.description: 枪手接近正在坐着的守卫和正在使用洗手间的守卫

edges.support_text: The attacks began as the nightly curfew lifted in Baghdad at 5 a.m.
Gunmen, dressed as municipal street cleaners, ambushed 10 police and army checkpoints across the city...
Bombings soon followed in Falluja, Samarra, Tarmiya and Suwayra...
Improvised bombs near Samarra wounded Iranian pilgrims and farmers.
The attacks, which killed at least 101 people and wounded hundreds more, occurred amid a protracted dispute...
Hilla纺织厂停车场发生两辆汽车炸弹同步爆炸
The attacks underscored the ability of Iraq’s various extremist groups to mount catastrophic attacks throughout the country despite increased security...
One of Iraq’s two vice presidents, Adel Abdul Mahdi, called for speeding the formation of a new government...
The attacks occurred amid a protracted dispute over the results of the country’s election more than two months ago.
A security officer described the attack as an effort to deepen the country’s political turmoil.
In Hilla, another supporter of Mr. Allawi’s alliance, Hassan al-Fatlawi, blamed the local provincial council... for removing security barriers.
袭击持续至宵禁解除后
枪手杀害9名士兵和官员
伤亡人数因工人下班离开而增加
周一死亡人数突破101人（语义描述1）与超过上月伤亡（语义描述2）存在时间递进关系
他们不想政府成立与Adel Abdul Mahdi呼吁加速组建新政府存在逻辑关联
